title: Junior/Mid Application Developer (.NET)
description:
We are looking for a passionate Application Developers to design, develop and install software solutions. You will be a part of a rockstar team that works with the latest technologies to build world-class digital products for our international clients. We are one of the fastest growing tech startups in Australia. Our work scales from local to global, and we specialize in creating digital experiences, solutions, and tools for mission-driven organizations.

We love to create things that have a positive impact on the world. We have an unquenchable hunger for more and we want to achieve more with you.

RESPONSIBILITIES:
• Design, develop database structures and modify database code
• Develop robust, scalable custom code solutions for the application
• Documents and demonstrates solutions by developing documentation, flowcharts, layouts, diagrams, charts, code comments and clear code.
• Performing and assisting with integration tests
• Provide web development and project support
requirements:
We are looking for people with results they are proud of, such as:

Advanced spoken and intermediate written English
Enjoy coding in C# .NET
Good general knowledge of databases sructures and algorithms
Ability to learn new languages and technologies
Resourcefulness and troubleshooting aptitude
Attention to detail
